turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Do you give to charities?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Yes I sometimes give to charities. How about you?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I do, one of if not my favorite is Save The Children.  With that one I know exactly where the money is going.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: It is always very important to know where your money is going. I donate both time and money to a charity called Food back packs for kids. It is very rewarding.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I do know that Save The Children is very active with the situation in Syria.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Oh really? I haven't really paid much attention to charities that do thing outside our own country. I prefer to help here at home first in my community.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: That is fair too, they help in situations all around the world.  Home is important too though.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: There are just so many people to help everywhere it can be kind of overwhelming. It's important to give to all kinds of organizations when we can.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: That is true, I think people forget that the price of a cup of coffee here can be a weeks worth of food elsewhere

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Yeah that is definetly a hard thing to wrap my head around. I have to stop and remind myself many times that even on what I may consider my worst day, there are people who live through worse every day. Do you ever volunteer your time at any charities for kids?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I help out at the local Goodwill 2 or 3 times a year, and kids benefit from that so I would say yes.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: That's good. I really enjoy helping kids, its rewarding to see things from their perspective. And refreshing.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I agree, kids give an honest view of the world and this can be very refreshing.  And we need to help them.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Yes, changing the cycle of poverty is something desperately needed. Even if just one child is helped to see that they are more than what their circumstances have to offer its a win.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: So would you be willing to donate a share of your bonus to Save The Children? The research team will collect all donations and send it to Save the Children.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I would possibly be interested in donating some of it. I would like to know more about it before I donate.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Save the Children is an international non-governmental organization that promotes children's rights, provides relief and helps support children in developing countries.  There is a website  URL

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: thank you for the info. I would donate a portion of the bonus

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: How much do you like to donate to the charity now? Your donation will be directly deducted from your task payment. You can choose any amount from $0 to all your payment.  I myself am giving 0.25.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I Think 0.25 is a good amount

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Fantastic, thanks a lot!  This is a great cause, thank you!

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: My pleasure glad I can help in some way.
